      • makeRunnableSafe

        public static java.lang.Runnable makeRunnableSafe(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Decorate runnable with another safe-runnable (with GEC)
        Parameters:
        runnable - Any unsafe Runnable
        Returns:
        Safe Runnable (GEC-enabled)

      • doInUIThreadAndWaitSafe

        public static void doInUIThreadAndWaitSafe(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Safe UI-thread (AWT dispatcher thread) invoker joins UI-thread and execute provided runnable. And performs an additional checking: simply invoke runnable, if already in UI-thread. Blocks current thread and wait to runnable done.
        Parameters:
        runnable - Runnable to execute

      • doInUIThreadAndWait

        public static void doInUIThreadAndWait(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
                                throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                       java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        Unsafe analog of doUnUIThreadAndWaitSafe(), but still perform UI-thread checking
        Parameters:
        runnable - Runnable to execute
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Runnable execution was interrupted
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - Exception while Runnable invocation

      • doInUIThreadLaterSafe

        public static void doInUIThreadLaterSafe(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Decorate runnable with Exception-safe decorator and put it to AWT-event queue. Runnable may executed in AWT-dispatcher thread.
        Parameters:
        runnable - Runnable to decorate and execute

      • doInUIThreadLater

        public static void doInUIThreadLater(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Simply put runnable in AWT-event queue "as is" Unsafe and may raise unchecked exceptions
        Parameters:
        runnable - Runnable to execute

      • doWithEntireComponentTree

        public static void doWithEntireComponentTree(java.awt.Component component,
                                             java.util.function.Consumer<java.awt.Component> consumer)
        Process all of components in tree with consumer. Accept parent component with consumer and if component is JComponent subclass then recursively accept all of child components
        Parameters:
        component - Root-component in tree
        consumer - Consumer that accepts components

      • doIfJComponent

        public static void doIfJComponent(java.awt.Component component,
                                  java.util.function.Consumer<javax.swing.JComponent> consumer)
        Accepts consumer, only if component is JComponent subclass and not null
        Parameters:
        component - Component to check and accept
        consumer - Consumer that accepts component

      • loadFontAsMainSafe

        public static void loadFontAsMainSafe(java.io.File fontFile,
                                      java.awt.Component... components)
        Load font, and set as main font for all components in components tree. Any raised exceptions are dispatched to GEC.
        Parameters:
        fontFile - Font-file to load
        components - Component-tree roots

      • loadFontAsMain

        public static void loadFontAsMain(java.io.File fontFile,
                                  java.awt.Component... components)
                           throws java.awt.FontFormatException,
                                  java.io.IOException
        Unsafe (without GEC) variant of loadFontAsMainSafe(File....) method
        Parameters:
        fontFile - Font-file to load
        components - Component-tree roots
        Throws:
        java.awt.FontFormatException - Wrong or unknown font format
        java.io.IOException - IO-error when reading font

      • loadFontAsMainSafe

        public static void loadFontAsMainSafe(java.io.InputStream fontInputStream,
                                      java.awt.Component... components)
        Load font from InputStream, and set as main font for all components in components tree. Any raised exceptions are dispatched to GEC.
        Parameters:
        fontInputStream - InputStream
        components - Component-tree roots

      • loadFontAsMainSafe

        public static void loadFontAsMainSafe(java.net.URL fontURL,
                                      java.awt.Component... components)
        Load font from URL, and set as main font for all components in components tree. Any raised exceptions are dispatched to GEC.
        Parameters:
        fontURL - URL of font to load
        components - Component-tree roots
